metadata.title: CVE-2012-6083 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Freeciv before 2.3.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of servicevia a crafted packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6083` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freeciv - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-client-extras - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-client-gtk - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-client-gtk3 - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-client-qt - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-client-sdl - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-data - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-server - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-sound-standard - 2.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freeciv package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.2-1').
